name: Button-Bot
description:
Button-Bot is an exciting new idle game / team competition / digital pet inspired by a redstone device built by MumboJumbo in season 7 of Hermitcraft. Button-bot is a 10ish hour countdown clock of battery emojis above a rainbow. Press the trackball reaction to reset the timer back to the beginning, and gain the current color's role. Each role gives access to a uniquely themed channel, where members can chat and discover secret bot commands related to their theme.

Some might try to get every role once, others might aim only for the highest, and still others might find a color or community they like and settle in. There are many ways to play, but only one Button per server, so don't forget to keep it alive!

Writing, interaction ideas, pseudocode by L-Mop.

Final code by Camden.
